comments.body: Refer https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/49414#pullrequestreview-180616762 The capability dict in onyx cliconf plugin can store version and other product releated information at time of connection initilaization instead of executing `show version` for every task run.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +153,157 @@    def load_current_config(self):
        # called in base class in run function
        self._os_version = self._get_os_version()
        self._current_config = dict()
        magp_data = self._get_magp_config()
